Module Slope.ECS
Package org.lucasstarsz.slope.component

Class ECSComponentArray<T extends IComponent>

java.lang.Object
org.lucasstarsz.slope.component.ECSComponentArray<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The generic type of the component to be stored in a given component array. Uses of (.) must implement IComponent.
All Implemented Interfaces:
IComponentArray
public class ECSComponentArray<T extends IComponent>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IComponentArray
The container of components for each type of component to be stored.

    • ECSComponentArray

      public ECSComponentArray​(int maxEntityCount)
      Creates an ECSComponentArray with the specified maximum entity count.
      Parameters:
      maxEntityCount - The maximum amount of entities allowed within the component array.

  • Method Details

    • insertData

      public <C extends IComponent> void insertData​(int entity, C component)
      Adds the specified component to the component array.
      Type Parameters:
      C - The generic type of the component to add. Uses of C must implement IComponent, identical to type T already defined.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity (and array index) to add the component for.
      component - The component to add.

    • removeData

      public void removeData​(int entity)
      Removes the data for the specified entity, if it exists.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to remove data for.

    • getData

      public T getData​(int entity)
      Gets the component bound to the specified entity, if it exists.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to get the bound component of.
      Returns:
      The existing component.

    • entityDestroyed

      public void entityDestroyed​(int entity)
      Removes the specified entity's component if it exists.
      Specified by:
      entityDestroyed in interface IComponentArray
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity whose components are to be removed.

      public int getValidEntryCount()
      Gets the total size of valid entries in the component array.
      Returns:
      The total size of valid entries in the component array.
